Params: {3: 'The old man is carefully reading through the application displayed on his terminal. Seated across the desk, Freeman nervously intertwines his fingers.'}
{3: "Finally, the old man sets down the terminal and begins to speak, but rather than calming Freeman's nerves, his words only serve to further tighten Freeman's body."}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'I can tell how determined you are from your application, but I still want to confirm with you one last time as your instructor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'Are you sure you want to become a Construct?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Having mentally prepared himself before the meeting, Freeman's words flow effortlessly from his mouth, devoid of any hesitation."}

{2: 'Freeman', 3: "I'm fully aware of my limitations. When it comes to the stability of the Mind Beacon, I don't meet the standard to become a commandant. In terms of strategic and tactical theory, I fall short of the threshold for the General Staff.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Freeman', 3: "After my parents died in the war, my sister developed hemophobia, making it impossible for her to study at F.O.S. with the same financial support that I've received.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Freeman', 3: "My parents' pension is not enough to cover my sister's education, so I have to become a commandant... or a Construct.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Freeman', 3: "Now that I don't seem to have the talent to become a commandant, my only option is to choose the latter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Freeman', 3: "Instructor, it's not that I want to become a Construct. It's that I have no other choice but to become one.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old man maintains a stoic silence, aware that he cannot show any bias, despite Freeman being his student.'}
{3: 'Moreover, this rule was originally made by their generation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Instructor', 3: "I'll send your application to the military.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'But before that, I still want you to complete the graduation test.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: "Even if you can't become a commandant, the knowledge you're acquiring now will undoubtedly prove valuable on the battlefield in the future.", 4: '1'}
